name: Quest of Cthulhu
description:
Quest of Cthulhu

Quest of Cthulhu is a casual arcade game in which you must guide Cthulhu safely through the tunnels and beyond to gather the treasure at the end. 

* Multiple levels

* Awesome soundtrack

* Great hand drawn art!

*Who can resist Cthulhu! 

Game will continue to be worked on adding more levels.

WARNING: I cannot be held responsible if you become addicted to gameplay and miss school, work, weddings, funerals, etc.
